marker.ph: /* if you want to use a different Application Delegate class from "AppDelegate" ... */

<<Grid Padding="12" RowSpacing="6" ColumnSpacing="6"> <Grid.Margin> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="Thickness"> <On Platform="iOS" Value="0, 22, 0, 0" /> </OnPlatform> </Grid.Margin> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="40" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<Label Text="Scroll to the bottom of the list to load more." />
<ActivityIndicator Grid.Column="1" WidthRequest="32" HeightRequest="32" IsRunning="True" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}" />
<StackLayout Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Orientation="Vertical"> <SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <!-- a normal list view --> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>
<!-- the row definition --> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>
<!-- the "loading..." view --> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>
</StackLayout>
</Grid>.../>

<<Grid.Margin> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="Thickness"> <On Platform="iOS" Value="0, 22, 0, 0" /> </OnPlatform> </Grid.Margin> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="40" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Label Text="Scroll to the bottom of the list to load more." /> <ActivityIndicator Grid.Column="1" WidthRequest="32" HeightRequest="32" IsRunning="True" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}" /> <StackLayout Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Orientation="Vertical"> <SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <!-- a normal list view --> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>
<!-- the row definition --> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>
<!-- the "loading..." view --> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>
</StackLayout>.../>

<<SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>
<!-- the row definition --> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>
<!-- the "loading..." view --> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>.../>

<<ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>.../>

<<Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" />.../>
/* if you want to use a different Application Delegate class from "AppDelegate" ... */

<<Grid Padding="12" RowSpacing="6" ColumnSpacing="6"> <Grid.Margin> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="Thickness"> <On Platform="iOS" Value="0, 22, 0, 0" /> </OnPlatform> </Grid.Margin> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="40" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<Label Text="Scroll to the bottom of the list to load more." />
<ActivityIndicator Grid.Column="1" WidthRequest="32" HeightRequest="32" IsRunning="True" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}" />
<StackLayout Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Orientation="Vertical"> <SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <!-- a normal list view --> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>
<!-- the row definition --> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>
<!-- the "loading..." view --> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>
</StackLayout>
</Grid>.../>

<<Grid.Margin> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="Thickness"> <On Platform="iOS" Value="0, 22, 0, 0" /> </OnPlatform> </Grid.Margin> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="40" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Label Text="Scroll to the bottom of the list to load more." /> <ActivityIndicator Grid.Column="1" WidthRequest="32" HeightRequest="32" IsRunning="True" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}" /> <StackLayout Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Orientation="Vertical"> <SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <!-- a normal list view --> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>
<!-- the row definition --> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>
<!-- the "loading..." view --> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>
</StackLayout>.../>

<<SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>
<!-- the row definition --> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>
<!-- the "loading..." view --> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>.../>

VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>.../>

VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid Padding="12" RowSpacing="6" ColumnSpacing="6"> <Grid.Margin> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="Thickness"> <On Platform="iOS" Value="0, 22, 0, 0" /> </OnPlatform> </Grid.Margin> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="40" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<Label Text="Scroll to the bottom of the list to load more." />
<ActivityIndicator Grid.Column="1" WidthRequest="32" HeightRequest="32" IsRunning="True" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}" />
<StackLayout Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Orientation="Vertical"> <SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <!-- a normal list view --> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>
<!-- the row definition --> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>
<!-- the "loading..." view --> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>
</StackLayout>
</Grid>.../>

<<Grid.Margin> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="Thickness"> <On Platform="iOS" Value="0, 22, 0, 0" /> </OnPlatform> </Grid.Margin> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="40" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Label Text="Scroll to the bottom of the list to load more." /> <ActivityIndicator Grid.Column="1" WidthRequest="32" HeightRequest="32" IsRunning="True" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}" /> <StackLayout Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Orientation="Vertical"> <SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <!-- a normal list view --> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>
<!-- the row definition --> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>
<!-- the "loading..." view --> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>
</StackLayout>.../>

<<Grid Padding="12" RowSpacing="6" ColumnSpacing="6"> <Grid.Margin> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="Thickness"> <On Platform="iOS" Value="0, 22, 0, 0" /> </OnPlatform> </Grid.Margin> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="40" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<Label Text="Scroll to the bottom of the list to load more." />
<ActivityIndicator Grid.Column="1" WidthRequest="32" HeightRequest="32" IsRunning="True" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}" />
<StackLayout Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Orientation="Vertical"> <SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <!-- a normal list view --> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>
<!-- the row definition --> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>
<!-- the "loading..." view --> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>
</StackLayout>
</Grid>.../>

<<Grid.Margin> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="Thickness"> <On Platform="iOS" Value="0, 22, 0, 0" /> </OnPlatform> </Grid.Margin> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="40" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Label Text="Scroll to the bottom of the list to load more." /> <ActivityIndicator Grid.Column="1" WidthRequest="32" HeightRequest="32" IsRunning="True" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}" /> <StackLayout Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Orientation="Vertical"> <SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <!-- a normal list view --> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>
<!-- the row definition --> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>
<!-- the "loading..." view --> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>
</StackLayout>.../>

<<Grid Padding="12" RowSpacing="6" ColumnSpacing="6"> <Grid.Margin> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="Thickness"> <On Platform="iOS" Value="0, 22, 0, 0" /> </OnPlatform> </Grid.Margin> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="40" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<Label Text="Scroll to the bottom of the list to load more." />
<ActivityIndicator Grid.Column="1" WidthRequest="32" HeightRequest="32" IsRunning="True" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}" />
<StackLayout Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Orientation="Vertical"> <SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <!-- a normal list view --> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>
<!-- the row definition --> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid Padding="12"> <Label Text="{Binding Name}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>
<!-- the "loading..." view --> <ListView.Footer> <Grid Padding="6" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}"> <!-- set the footer to have a zero height when invisible --> <Grid.Triggers> <Trigger TargetType="Grid" Property="IsVisible" Value="False"> <Setter Property="HeightRequest" Value="0" /> </Trigger> </Grid.Triggers> <!-- the loading content --> <Label Text="Loading..." VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>
</StackLayout>
</Grid>.../>

<<Grid.Margin> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="Thickness"> <On Platform="iOS" Value="0, 22, 0, 0" /> </OnPlatform> </Grid.Margin> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="40" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Label Text="Scroll to the bottom of the list to load more." /> <ActivityIndicator Grid.Column="1" WidthRequest="32" HeightRequest="32" IsRunning="True" IsVisible="{Binding IsWorking}" /> <StackLayout Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Orientation="Vertical"> <SearchBar Text="{Binding SearchText, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <!-- a normal list view --> <ListView CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ItemsSource="{Binding Shows}" SeparatorVisibility="None" HasUnevenRows="False" RowHeight="45">
<!-- the behavior that will enable infinite scrolling --> <ListView.Behaviors> <infiniteScrolling:InfiniteScrollBehavior IsLoadingMore="{Binding IsWorking}" /> </ListView.Behaviors>

VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> </Grid> </ListView.Footer>
</ListView>
